jNab.core.bunny
Class Bunny

java.lang.Object
  jNab.core.bunny.Bunny

public class Bunny
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapping class for bunnies.

getPluginByName

public AbstractPlugin getPluginByName(java.lang.String pluginName)
                               throws NoSuchPluginException
Getting a plugin belonging to the bunny, given its name.

Parameters:
pluginName - the name of the plugin to search for.
Returns:
the plugin belonging to the bunny and whose name is pluginName.
Throws:
NoSuchPluginException - if no plugin whose name is pluginName belongs to the bunny.

getNextPacket

public Packet getNextPacket()
Getting the next packet to be sent to the bunny, removing it from the list of packets to be sent. If there is no packets in the list, null is returned.

Returns:
the next packet to be sent to bunny.

wakeUp

public void wakeUp()
Notifying the bunny to wake up.

goToSleep

public void goToSleep()
Notifying the bunny to go to sleep.

handleEvent

public void handleEvent(int eventType,
                        java.lang.Object[] eventParams)
Handling a new event coming from the bunny by notifying each relevant plugin.

Parameters:
eventType - the event type (should be one of the XY_EVENT values, as defined by constant fields.
eventParams - information that come with the event if relevant (e.g. ears positions in case of ears movement event), as an array of Object references.

handleRequest

public void handleRequest(HTTPRequest request)
Handling a new request coming from the bunny and dispatching it to the attached plugins.

Parameters:
request - the request coming from the bunny.

equals
